Articles.Content:
Hello everyone!

This is my first post in the forum, so nice to meet you. I will gladly share with you my first Touristic Base with a Rover with anti overturning system ready to explore the Mun!

The Base has a capacity for 10 kerbals and I landed it at the 3rd time. About the rover, I just landed about 20 km away from the base, so I had an excursion to arrive there .

Edited August 12, 2013 by Himitsu Tai
added prefix
This is really nice looking and very simple, do you have the craft file for it?
I like the disigned. I am just trying to work out how he landed it.
Probably landed it top right, and then it just flipped over.
looking at it, it has two viewing modules at each end, so I can't see that option working Box. I am looking and thinking about adding a skyCrine to it so I can lower it onto the plante
